title: Twitter for iOS is testing a ‘CC’ button to turn video captions on or off
content:
The social media giant announced on its own platform today that a “CC” button is in the works. When watching videos on Twitter, the “CC” button gives users the option to turn captions on or off. The feature is currently in testing for some iOS users, with Android following soon.
